div.p: Kaplan–Meier survivorship curves (cumulative survival [%] over time [days]) for rainbow trout after challenge with Yersinia ruckeri; the fish were fed with pomegranate seeds oil supplemented diets (0, 5, 10, or 20 g of PSO/kg of feed; diets PSO 0, PSO 5, PSO 10, and PSO 20, respectively) prior to bacterial challenge 209 mm × 232 mm (300 × 300 DPI).
